gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of local incoming phone numbers associated with their Twilio account to manage their communication channels effectively.
gold.ideal: A successful response containing an array of local incoming phone numbers with details such as phone number, friendly name, and status.

gold.user: User needs to create a new local incoming phone number for their Twilio account to enhance their business presence in a specific area.
gold.ideal: A successful response confirming the creation of the local incoming phone number with its details, including the new phone number and its SID.
